/////////////////// hex values

Rams 5BC & 5BD

Bred(melcu)     =22/28/32/43/49/4A
Two P(rapid)    =21/27/31/40-42
Axl(apara)      =23/29/33/39
Andore(muntele) =25/2B/35
Poison(tarfa)   =20/26/30/37
El Gado(mosu)   =24/2A/34/3E
Thrasher(1boss) =80 (1049F)
Kitana(2boss)   =81 (104A3)
Abigal(3boss)   =90 (104A7)
Kitana2(4boss)  =83 (104AB)
Belger(5boss)   =74 (104AF) {don't use}

Hp limits 0A-68
